include(Reprojucer)

endif()

  "${ComponentTutorialExample_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${ComponentTutorialExample_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "oNvA5C"
)
